players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am shocked by Alice's death. We need to be careful and figure out who the mafia is."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night—he's innocent. Diana must be the mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
